name: Vortex Rush
description: Pit yourself against the clock as you weave through the vortex avoiding obstacles and going as far as possible before your time expires. Vortex rush challenges you to go as fast as possible and stay alive doing it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
